node.detail_zh: 患者為第 #1519 宗個案患者的女兒，過往健康良好，無外遊記錄。7 月 12 日開始發燒。
node.detail_en: The patient is the daughter of patient #1519 with good past health and no travel history. She developed fever on July 12.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者
